task.title: Implement custom time updates
task.shortdesc:
In certain analytics implementations, the client application may want to provide a different playhead position than the one reported by the
localTime value. For example, during a LINEAR stream playback, each program’s playhead can be provided relative to it’s start time.

context.note: Override this method only if you want to provide a different playhead position than the default position.
